Sentencas: Nickel oxide and yttria-stabilized zirconia (NiO-YSZ) composite powders were synthesized by a new situ-combustion method in this paper.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ composite powder by a combustion method and its application for cathode of SOEC

Sentencas: The adding amount of CO(NH2)(2) was calculated by the combustion reaction equation.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ composite powder by a combustion method and its application for cathode of SOEC

Sentencas: The products were characterized by X-ray diffraction, field emission scanning electronic microscope and electrochemical impedance spectra (EIS).
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ composite powder by a combustion method and its application for cathode of SOEC

Sentencas: The results showed that the products were well crystallized with NiO coating on YSZ particles.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ composite powder by a combustion method and its application for cathode of SOEC

Sentencas: The optimized ratio of CO(NH2)(2) to Ni(NO3)(2) was 2:1.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ composite powder by a combustion method and its application for cathode of SOEC

Sentencas: A single solid oxide electrolysis cell made from NiO-YSZ composite cathode with the powder prepared at optimized ratio 2:1 exhibited better performance than other samples with the electrolytic voltage of 0.98 V.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ composite powder by a combustion method and its application for cathode of SOEC

Sentencas: The electrolytic cell was operated steadily at 900 degrees C for 2 h with the current of 0.33 A cm(-2) when the stream of 80% H2O + 20% H-2 was input.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ composite powder by a combustion method and its application for cathode of SOEC

Sentencas: EIS analysis indicated that H2O adsorption and diffusion of the Ni-YSZ electrode were the limited step in the whole electrolysis reaction.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ composite powder by a combustion method and its application for cathode of SOEC
